# Generative AI on Vertex AI - Use Imagen on Vertex AI's visual captioning and Visual Question Answering (VQA) to get image information (Console)
# Use Imagen on Vertex AI's visual captioning and Visual Question Answering (VQA) to get image information (Console)
Learn how to use Imagen on Vertex AI's visual captioning and Visual Question Answering (VQA) features to get text information about an image. This quickstart shows you how to use visual captioning and VQA in the Google Cloud console.
content:
## Before you begin
## Get the sample imageAfter you have set up your environment, you can get a sample image and use visual captioning and Visual Question Answering to get information about the image.To get the sample image, either download the image [directly from Cloud Storage](https://storage.googleapis.com/cloud-samples-data/generative-ai/image/vcap-vqa-quickstart_fish.jpg) , or use the following command to save it in the current directory:
```
curl -O https://storage.googleapis.com/cloud-samples-data/generative-ai/image/vcap-vqa-quickstart_fish.jpg
```## Generate image descriptions with visual captioningAfter you get the sample image, you can send the visual captioning request to get a text descriptions of the image.
- In the Google Cloud console, open the **Vertex AI Studio > Vision** tab in the Vertex AI dashboard. [Go to the Vertex AI Studio tab](https://console.cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative/vision) 
- In the lower menu, click subtitles **Caption** .
- Click **Upload image** and select the local image to caption.
- In the **Parameters** panel, set the following:- **Number of captions** : Select`2`.
- **Language** : If not already selected, choose`English (en)`.
- Click play_arrow **Generate captions** .
## Generate answers to questions with VQAFinally, you can use the same image to ask a question about the image and get an answer using the VQA feature.
- In the Google Cloud console, open the **Vertex AI Studio > Vision** tab in the Vertex AI dashboard. [Go to the Vertex AI Studio tab](https://console.cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative/vision) 
- In the lower menu, click forum **Visual Q&A** .
- Click **Upload image** and select the local image.
- In the **Parameters** panel, select 2 as the **Number of answers** .
- In the prompt ( ) field, enter the following text:```
What color is the left fish?
```
- Click play_arrow **Generate** .
Congratulations! You've just used Imagen's visual captioning and VQA features to get information about an image.## Clean upTo avoid incurring charges to your Google Cloud account for   the resources used on this page, follow these steps.## What's next
- Read [usage guidelines](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/image/usage-guidelines) for Imagen on Vertex AI.
- Explore pretrained models in [Model Garden](/vertex-ai/docs/start/explore-models) .
- Learn about [responsible AI best practices and Vertex AI's safety filters](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/responsible-ai) .
